name: Star Wars: TIE Fighter - Enemies of the Empire
summary: The expansion pack named "Enemies of the Empire" is the second out of two for the 1994 flight simulation game "Star Wars: TIE Fighter". This expansion includes battles Eleven, Twelve, and Thirteen. Although it was not available for purchase separately, it was included in the 1995 Collector's CD-ROM and all later releases of the original game.
